text: Kathie Lee Gifford wants her friends to know she ’ ll stand by them. The Today show host, 64, called into Andy Cohen ’ s radio show on Wednesday, March 14, revealing that she reached out to both Harvey Weinstein and Bill Cosby after numerous women made allegations against them. “ Since I got into this business as a teenage girl, I have been sexually harassed, I have been sexually abused and I have been date raped. Don ’ t tell me they ’ re all the same, because they are not, ” she said on Andy Radio. “ I don ’ t want to throw everybody on the same manure pile. Being a jerk is not the same as being a rapist.
